original_text: For since the message spoken through angels was binding, and every violation and disobedience received its just punishment,
korean_text: 천사들을 통하여 하신 말씀이 견고하게 되어 모든 범죄함과 순종하지 아니한 자들이 공정한 보응을 받았거든

sentences.original_text: For since the message spoken through angels was binding
sentences.korean_translation: 이는 천사들을 통해 전파된 말씀이 확고했기 때문이며

sentences.original_text: and every violation and disobedience received its just punishment
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 모든 위반과 불순종은 그 정당한 형벌을 받았습니다
